name: Progress-Keeper
desc: Track, transform and present changelog entries.

releases.remarks: Another service release with few updates on internal dependencies.

changelog.desc: Changed install workflow to 'composer update' (instead of install).
Adjusted composer dependencies for alternative php versions (5 or 7) again.

releases.remarks: Small service release with few updates on internal dependencies.

changelog.desc: Updated to latest composer version (included as phar file).
Updated dependency on league/commonmark (0.17.0 -> 0.17.5).

releases.remarks: Small bugfix release providing a fix for the HTML presenter.

changelog.desc: HTML presenter won't convert special characters into their corresponding html entities.

releases.remarks: Small service release providing some improvements in detail.

changelog.desc: Improved introduction, corrected some details about current API, added hints for contributors.
Added additional Travis CI test runner for PHP 7.2.
BREAKING CHANGE: HTML presenter now renders the log entry scope value (if present) as prefix of the description.
HTML presenter now adds a css class 'pk-logentry-type-[type]' class to log entry inline element.

releases.remarks: Simple markdown presenter, new progress-keeper command, Travis CI integration and more.

changelog.desc: Locked composer deps to PHP 5.6 compatible versions.
Added new reader type: Markdown. Parses a markdown changelog from AST which is structured like the one the markdown presenter generates.
BREAKING CHANGE: Markdown presenter now renders types in the form 'type:' instead of '[type]'.
BREAKING CHANGE: Renamed methods for parsing changelog, releases and log entries from from array to readFromArray().
BREAKING CHANGE: Changed signature of LogEntryType constructor now parsing first argument as 'conventional commit message'.
Extended LogEntryType by introducing field 'scope' and adding methods parsing type, scope and description from conventional commit messages and types.
Extracted AbstractReader providing basic member and access methods.
Added Travis CI badge.
Added integration with Travis CI.
Extracted method getCanonicalType() and moved it to class LogEntryType.
Added syntax highlighting for JSON changelog example.
Updated README by adding a paragraph about the internal JSON format plus some basic model and API concepts.
Added composer 'pre-commit' script which builds markdown and HTML versions of the own PK changelog.
Added simple command which calls factory method 'getConvertedChangelog' with CLI arguments.
Renamed 'release-info.json' files to 'pk-changelog.json'.
Added new presenter: Markdown. Allows for generating simple markdown from given changelog.
Added test class for testing presenters + extracted sample changelog generation to JsonSampleTextCase super class.
BREAKING CHANGE: Changed output for HTML presenter: New tag structure and prettified formatting.

releases.remarks: New log entry type list + filter and sort methods + a lot of housekeeping.

changelog.desc: Added method to fetch latest release (i.e. top most) of a changelog.
Added method to fetch version string of latest release (i.e. top most) of a changelog.
BREAKING CHANGE: Minor corrections of class names for releases -> release -> logentries -> logentry.
Added methods to order (group) log entries by type, using default or a custom type order.
Added (most) log entry types found in "keep-a-changelog" and various log entry (commit) type aliases.
Consistently renamed changeLog (camelCase) to changelog (lowercase).
Added methods to filter log entries to specific audience(s).
Renaming test classes after unintentionally adding fragment 'sample' to all test cases.
BREAKING CHANGE: Removed class ProgressKeeper and refactored methods of ProgressKeeperInterface.
BREAKING CHANGE: Field identifier (key) 'adnc' is replaced by 'audi' as an alias for 'audience'.

releases.remarks: Initial release: Provides a basic factory class methods allowing a json -> html transformation.

changelog.desc: Release 0.1.0
Added methods for adding releases to changelogs. Object model hierarchy is now: changelog -> releases -> log entries
Added methods for adding log entries to releases.
Only mandatory log entry fields would be correctly set by parse-from-array method.
Clarified main goals of this project + some cosmetic changes.
Added classes representing log entries and releases.
Committing this project to the follow the principles of conventional-changelog and keep-a-changelog.
Very first sketch using a Reader/Presenter interface concept and a ProgressKeeperFactory.
